intro: Hicriopteris omeiensis, commonly known as the Omei holly fern, is a rare fern species native to the mountainous regions of Sichuan Province in China. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, Hicriopteris omeiensis is considered a vulnerable species in its native range.
